cast.name: 布莱恩·弗莱 Bryan Grieg Fry
彼得·卡帕尔迪 Peter Capaldi

this_title: The Natural World--Komodo: The Deadly Bite
trans_title: BBC自然世界：死亡之吻—科莫多巨蜥
introduction: The Natural World: Season 31, Episode 4The Komodo dragon was discovered one hundred years ago, yet the true nature of the biggest lizard in the world is only just being uncovered. Using hi-tech tools to take a fresh look at this prehistoric beast, Dr Bryan Fry discovers there is a lot more to the dragon than meets the eye - from hidden venom glands to its secret origins.
chinese_title: BBC自然世界：死亡之吻—科莫多巨蜥
foreign_title: The Natural World--Komodo: The Deadly Bite
